title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to pull, create, and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for chatting with Ollama models, comparable to ChatGPT interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced command-line wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like code-completion plugin powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-hub
summary: Community registry for sharing Ollama Modelfiles and pre-configured model recipes.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat interface that connects to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: Docker images and scripts optimized for running Ollama with NVIDIA GPU acceleration.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLM conversations into any Discord server.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that wraps Ollama for use in CI pipelines to generate docs or tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-kit
summary: Swift package for macOS/iOS apps to integrate local LLM inference via Ollama.
